title: MBP A1286 - Early 2011 - Lines during boot loader, boot loop.
message: MBP A1286 - Early 2011 - Lines during boot loader but lines go away for a moment before involuntary reboot.  This same series of events continues to repeat.  No batter installed bc batter was swollen and needs to be replaced for sure, but no going to replace battery if there is a logic board issues or GPU issues.  No signs of liquid.  Does this sound familiar to anyone?  Thanks.
